title: IDEALWINE'S {{totaldomain}} PARTNERS
text:
At iDealwine, we work with top producers and are proud to have such long and loyal working relationships with so many. We have been working for over fifteen years with certain estates, even ending up as friends! You'll find their wines for sale on our website, where they're snapped up by wine lovers worldwide for a fixed price.
We source directly from more than {{totaldomain}} outstanding producers, bringing you the best of the best. And the cherry on top for you; these bottles are old at the same price you can find at the property itself!
